Job Description: What you should possess:     Among other stellar qualities, you should have:      - Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science) degree or equivalent     - Minimum    3 + years   of experience with a product development company     - Experience shipping high quality features in production, using analytics and experimentation     What makes you a strong candidate?   You get bonus points if you have:     - a deep understanding of mobile architecture patterns      - experience with battery optimization, location APIs, data-driven product development, analytics and A/B testing.      In addition, you will really grab our attention if you have recently contributed to a larger iOS community through Open Source and have advanced debugging skills using instruments.
